    ICD-10-PCS Body Systems

    systems.Rd

    ICD-10-PCS Body Systems

    Usage

    systems(x = NULL)

    Arguments

    x

    ICD-10-PCS body systems character, an alphanumeric code of length 1. If NULL (default), returns all 114 systems.

    Value

    tibble()

    Examples

    systems()
#> # A tibble: 114 × 4
#>     axis name        code  label                                    
#>    <int> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                    
#>  1     2 Body System 00    Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
#>  2     2 Body System 01    Peripheral Nervous System                
#>  3     2 Body System 02    Heart and Great Vessels                  
#>  4     2 Body System 03    Upper Arteries                           
#>  5     2 Body System 04    Lower Arteries                           
#>  6     2 Body System 05    Upper Veins                              
#>  7     2 Body System 06    Lower Veins                              
#>  8     2 Body System 07    Lymphatic and Hemic Systems              
#>  9     2 Body System 08    Eye                                      
#> 10     2 Body System 09    Ear, Nose, Sinus                         
#> # ℹ 104 more rows
systems("0")
#> # A tibble: 31 × 5
#>     axis name        code  label                                     sec  
#>    <int> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                     <chr>
#>  1     2 Body System 00    Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves 0    
#>  2     2 Body System 01    Peripheral Nervous System                 0    
#>  3     2 Body System 02    Heart and Great Vessels                   0    
#>  4     2 Body System 03    Upper Arteries                            0    
#>  5     2 Body System 04    Lower Arteries                            0    
#>  6     2 Body System 05    Upper Veins                               0    
#>  7     2 Body System 06    Lower Veins                               0    
#>  8     2 Body System 07    Lymphatic and Hemic Systems               0    
#>  9     2 Body System 08    Eye                                       0    
#> 10     2 Body System 09    Ear, Nose, Sinus                          0    
#> # ℹ 21 more rows
systems("2")
#> # A tibble: 2 × 5
#>    axis name        code  label               sec  
#>   <int> <chr>       <chr> <chr>               <chr>
#> 1     2 Body System 2W    Anatomical Regions  2    
#> 2     2 Body System 2Y    Anatomical Orifices 2    
systems("X")
#> # A tibble: 12 × 5
#>     axis name        code  label                                        sec  
#>    <int> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                        <chr>
#>  1     2 Body System X0    Nervous System                               X    
#>  2     2 Body System X2    Cardiovascular System                        X    
#>  3     2 Body System XD    Gastrointestinal System                      X    
#>  4     2 Body System XF    Hepatobiliary System and Pancreas            X    
#>  5     2 Body System XH    Skin, Subcutaneous Tissue, Fascia and Breast X    
#>  6     2 Body System XK    Muscles, Tendons, Bursae and Ligaments       X    
#>  7     2 Body System XN    Bones                                        X    
#>  8     2 Body System XR    Joints                                       X    
#>  9     2 Body System XT    Urinary System                               X    
#> 10     2 Body System XW    Anatomical Regions                           X    
#> 11     2 Body System XX    Physiological Systems                        X    
#> 12     2 Body System XY    Extracorporeal                               X
